Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Interface ControlBase

All Known Implementing Classes:
LocalClient, PlayerHandler
public interface ControlBase
Interface used for communication with a specific player connected to the server

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    endGame()
    Method called at the end of the match -> if this method is called the match has comes naturally to an end and the player can be disconnected without issues
    StateName
    getCurrentState()
     
    InitController
    getInitController()
     
    MatchController
    getMatchController()
     
    String
    getNickname()
     
    Player
    getPlayer()
     
    void
    setMatchController​(MatchController controller)
    Links the match controller to this client, when this method is called the client is considered in the match and so he will accept different types of messages
    void
    setPlayer​(Player player)
    Sets the player related to this client
    boolean
    write​(StoCMessage msg)
    Writes something to this player, the message has to be written in one of the subclasses of StoCMessage

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentState

      StateName getCurrentState()
      Returns:
      the current state of the player, either if he is in the first phases of connection or inside a match

    • getMatchController

      MatchController getMatchController()
      Returns:
      the MatchController related to this

    • getInitController

      InitController getInitController()
      Returns:
      the InitController related to this

    • getPlayer

      Player getPlayer()
      Returns:
      the player related to this client

    • getNickname

      String getNickname()
      Returns:
      the nickname of the player related to this. If there isn't yet a related player returns null.

    • setPlayer

      void setPlayer​(Player player)
      Sets the player related to this client
      Parameters:
      player - the player related to this client

    • setMatchController

      void setMatchController​(MatchController controller)
      Links the match controller to this client, when this method is called the client is considered in the match and so he will accept different types of messages
      Parameters:
      controller - the matchController to link

    • endGame

      void endGame()
      Method called at the end of the match -> if this method is called the match has comes naturally to an end and the player can be disconnected without issues

    • write

      boolean write​(StoCMessage msg)
      Writes something to this player, the message has to be written in one of the subclasses of StoCMessage
      Parameters:
      msg - the message you want to send to this player
      Returns:
      true if the message has been sent, false if something goes wrong in the output stream
